## ProductPriceDataInput type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ProductPriceDataInput = {

    channel?: Maybe<ResourceIdentifierInput>;
    validFrom?: Maybe<Scalars["DateTime"]>;
    validUntil?: Maybe<Scalars["DateTime"]>;
```
